segments.advisor_message: Alright, let's get into the details. Can you tell me the full name of your dependent? Just need it quick, you know.
segments.client_message: Yeah, it's uh, Jesse Parker, uh, my son, you know?

segments.advisor_message: Got it! And when's his birthday? Uh, I need it in, like, DD-MM-YYYY format.
segments.client_message: Oh, right, it's, uh, 15-04-2010. And he's gonna be dependent until, uh, like, 15-04-2025, I think.
